originalTitle: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
title: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
content: This is the highest number of confirmed casualties from a single African country in the Ukraine-Russia war.

originalTitle: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
title: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
content: He used the girls' mother's life-threatening illness as an opportunity to demand sex, said the US Office of Public Affairs.

originalTitle: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
title: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
content: The disgraced financier was in talks to buy luxury abode Bin Ennakhi - but the purchase was never completed.

originalTitle: UN’s Guterres condemns US-Israeli strikes, retaliatory attacks by Iran
title: UN’s Guterres condemns US-Israeli strikes, retaliatory attacks by Iran
content: United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres is calling for “genuine dialogue" after US-Israeli strikes on Iran.

originalTitle: Iran’s Foreign Ministry defends retaliatory strikes, slams US betrayal
title: Iran’s Foreign Ministry defends retaliatory strikes, slams US betrayal
content: Spokesman Esmaeil Baghaei says Iran's attacks on US targets across the region are legitimate defensive actions.

originalTitle: Iran’s Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei killed in US-Israeli attacks: Reports
title: Iran’s Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei killed in US-Israeli attacks: Reports
content: Iran's Tasnim and Mehr news agencies report that Khamenei remains 'steadfast and firm in commanding the field'.

originalTitle: Inside Iran, panic as strikes hit but for some it's a moment of relief
title: Inside Iran, panic as strikes hit but for some it's a moment of relief
content: Iranians talk about what is happening inside the country, despite an almost total internet blackout.

originalTitle: Luxury Dubai hotel hit as Iran launches retaliatory strikes across region
title: Luxury Dubai hotel hit as Iran launches retaliatory strikes across region
content: Smoke and flames rose from Dubai's Fairmont The Palm hotel as civilian targets came under fire along with the US military bases across the middle east.

originalTitle: Iran retaliation raises questions about US air defences
title: Iran retaliation raises questions about US air defences
content: Iran's strike on US Navy base in Bahrain will worry Washington and its allies in the region.

originalTitle: Semenyo makes the difference as Man City beat Leeds
title: Semenyo makes the difference as Man City beat Leeds
content: Antoine Semenyo's goal for Man City moments before half-time is enough to beat Leeds United and close in on leaders Arsenal in the Premier League.

originalTitle: Liverpool score five in dominant win over West Ham
title: Liverpool score five in dominant win over West Ham
content: Liverpool put five past West Ham United in a dominant performance that moves them up to fifth in the Premier League table.

originalTitle: Late Brentford winner thwarts spirited Burnley comeback
title: Late Brentford winner thwarts spirited Burnley comeback
content: Brentford hold on as Burnley have their three-goal comeback against squashed by Mikel Damsgaard's injury-time winner, with Ashley Barnes' last gasp equaliser ruled out.
